Text.valUnicode: Format CSV : Account ; Account Name ; Father Account ; Group Account

SQL_STMT_U.val: update OACT set Levels=1 where trim(FatherNum)=''
update OACT set Levels=:2 where FatherNum in (select AcctCode from OACT where Levels=:1)
UPDATE OACT SET POSTABLE='Y' WHERE NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM OACT B WHERE B.FatherNum=oact.AcctCode)
